text: he eemaan vaalo! un svachchh cheejon mein se, jo tumane kamaee hain tatha un cheezon mein se, jo hamane tumhaare lie dharatee se upajaayee hain, daan karo tatha usamen se us cheez ko daan karane ka nishchay na karo, jise tum svayan na le sako, parantu ye ki anadekhee kar jao tatha jaan lo ki allaah nihsprh, prashansit hai
